```{r}
aif = fread('../data/aifdata.csv')
roi = fread('../data/roidata.csv')
```

```{r}
aif_exp = as.matrix(aif[1,5:44])
roi_exp = as.matrix(roi[5,5:44])

vetperf(aifexp, roiexp, arrival_frame = 9, delta_t = 1.6, density = 1.)
```

```{r}
library(glmnet)

get_flow_scaled_residue(aif_exp, roi_exp, arrival_frame = 9, delta_t = 1.04, alpha = .1)
```
